original_text: Friends, when you did all this to Jesus, you did not really know what you were doing. Your leaders also did not understand.
korean_text: 형제들아 너희가 알지 못하여서 그리하였으며 너희 관리들도 그리한 줄 아노라

sentences.original_text: when you did all this to Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 이 모든 것을 예수께 행할 때

sentences.original_text: you did not really know what you were doing
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 자신이 무엇을 하는지 정말 알지 못했습니다

sentences.original_text: Your leaders also did not understand
